timeline.message: Merge branch 'pet-count-cmd' of github.com:IllyaMyshakov/runelite into pet-count-cmd

timeline.author: Adam-
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -562,6 +701,9 @@ public void onGameStateChanged(GameStateChanged event)
 			case LOADING:
 			case HOPPING:
 				pohOwner = null;

timeline.bodyText: It's possible to look at someone else's collection log in their poh, so this should check that similar to how the boss log checks it.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: Typically we inject Gson into the plugin, since is provided by the injector.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: RSProfileConfiguration is already per RS-profile, so it is not necessary to set the key to the client username. I would probably just use chatcommands as the group and pets as the key.
timeline.author: Adam-
Adam-

timeline.bodyText: What is this for? Does anything here throw?
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: As this was pulled directly from how the Emoji plugin works, the try catch was originally for if loading one of the png files failed. Good catch, will remove
replies.author: IllyaMyshakov

timeline.bodyText: Classes are placed in http-api if they are used in both runelite-client and http-service as part of the client <-> service communication, as its classpath is available in both modules. However, you are not using this in http-service, which means this class is in the wrong place.
